name: A Pandemia
description:
Pandemia

In this educative game, you have to guide the older people to their home. In the way, you can find a mask, to protect you and others, the alcohol in gel etc. Good luck! You can download the Windows and Android versions too.

Obs: Use the cell phone horizontally. Can you help ?

If you could support my work by making a donation  I would greatly appreciate it. I know that money can be tight, so please know that even $5 helps me a lot ! Let me know if you have any questions and I’ll be happy to answer them. Thank you!
